title: Implement verdict processing function
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Function handles all awaiting types correctly
- [ ] Terminal states (work, approval, review, content) close on approved
- [ ] Non-terminal states (input, escalation) close on rejected
- [ ] Checkpoint never closes
- [ ] Awaiting and Verdict cleared after processing
- [ ] ClosedAt set when closing
- [ ] No-op when Verdict or Awaiting is nil
